booking.header: LET'S MATCH YOU WITH THE RIGHT THERAPIST
booking.paragraph: Please fill out this short questionnaire to provide some general and anonymous background about you and the issues you'd like to deal with in online therapy. It would help us match you with the most suitable therapist for you.

step1.header: What Type Of Counseling Are You Looking For?

step3.header: Have You Ever Been In Therapy Before?

step4.header: Are There Any Specific Qualities That You'd Like In A Counselor?

step5.header: Are There Any Issues You'd Like To Focus On?

step6.paragraph1: Please specify (in a few sentences) why you'd like counseling.
step6.paragraph2: This will give your counselor a good understanding of where to start.

step7.paragraph1: Click Submit if you are sure of all your choices.
step7.paragraph2: Please Be Aware That This Action Will Cost You A Ticket!
step7.label7: I Agree to Terms of Services

stepFinal.paragraph1: Please check the therapists section in your dashboard to select your therapist and book with him.

multiStepForm.warning1: Error: You must agree to the Terms of Services!
multiStepForm.success: Form data saved successfully, look at your therapists matching list!
multiStepForm.error: Error: Form data could not be saved!
